description: This show-stopping dessert takes just 10 minutes to make. Save time with this clever pavlova smash recipe, it has all the flavour but none of the fuss.
name: Easy Mango & Passionfruit Pavlova Smash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Kensington Pride mangoes, peeled, thinly sliced
0.25 cup Woolworths sweet & salty macadamias, coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Using an electric mixer, beat cream and vanilla together in a large bowl until soft peaks form.
Spoon cream mixture onto a large platter. Arrange meringue and mango on cream. Drizzle over passionfruit pulp, then top with raspberries and macadamias. Serve.
